channel.title: iPhone on mostlymaths.net
channel.description: Recent content in iPhone on mostlymaths.net

item.title: 2019#8 Readings of the week
item.description: This edition has Software engineering, formal methods, fraud, Scala. Expect a similar wide range in the future as well. You can check all my weekly readings by checking the tag here . You can also get these as a weekly newsletter by subscribing here.

item.title: 2018: Year in Review
item.description: The year has ended, what has been going on?

item.title: Notifications from Spark on an Apple Watch (via IFTTT)
item.description: This week I have been working a lot with a relatively large dataset on a Spark shell. It was a graph with 1 billion nodes and 2 billion edges that I wanted to analyse with GraphFrames (the successor of GraphX on Spark).

item.title: Want to play? Get a MFi controller for Christmas
item.description: It would probably be an understatement to say I’m not a gamer. Last console I got was a Game Boy, 22 years ago (IIRC). Never got a gaming PC.
